errors.400: Operation cannot be performed: bad parameters
errors.401: Operation cannot be performed: authentication required
errors.402: Operation cannot be performed: payment error
errors.403: Operation cannot be performed: not allowed
errors.404: Operation cannot be performed: not found
errors.405: Operation cannot be performed: not allowed
errors.406: Operation cannot be performed: not acceptable
errors.411: Operation cannot be performed: length required
errors.429: Operation cannot be performed: too many requests
errors.498: This system or browser does not support web push notifications
errors.499: Please change your application or browser settings to allow notifications
errors.500: Operation cannot be performed: an error occured
errors.501: Operation cannot be performed: not implemented
errors.502: Operation cannot be performed: service unavailable
errors.503: Operation cannot be performed: service unavailable
errors.RETRY: Please try again later or modify your parameters
errors.RATE_LIMITING: Too many API requests in a given amount of time (rate limiting)
errors.RATE_LIMITING_AUTHENTICATION: Too many authentication requests in a given amount of time (rate limiting)
errors.WEAK_PASSWORD: The provided password does not comply our password policy
errors.WEAK_PASSWORD_LOWERCASE: A least one lower case letter
errors.WEAK_PASSWORD_UPPERCASE: A least one upper case letter
errors.WEAK_PASSWORD_SYMBOLS: A least one special symbol like :;?!+-.,^@
errors.WEAK_PASSWORD_ONEOF: Not known as one of the most common passwords
errors.WEAK_PASSWORD_PREVIOUS: Not one of your {history} last passwords
errors.CANNOT_REMOVE_USER:
Your are not allowed to remove this accound.
Please remove the organisations owned by {user} first.
errors.CANNOT_REMOVE_ORGANISATION:
You are not allowed to remove this organisation.
Please remove all the groups first.
errors.CANNOT_REMOVE_LAST_OWNER: You are not allowed to remove the last owner of {resource}
errors.OAUTH2_PROVIDER: You cannot update your account because it is managed by {provider}, in order to switch to a local account reset your password first
errors.EMAIL_ALREADY_TAKEN: A user with this email address seems to be already registered
errors.OBJECT_ID_ALREADY_TAKEN: An item with this identifier seems to already exist. Please try again with another value.
errors.UNSUPPORTED_FILE_FORMAT: The {file} file format is not supported
errors.INVALID_JSON_FILE: {file} is not a valid JSON file
errors.INVALID_CSV_FILE: {file} is not a valid CSV file

baseItem.REMOVE_ITEM_TITLE: Are you sure you want to delete {name} ?
baseItem.REMOVE_ITEM_MESSAGE: Please enter the name to confirm the deletion
baseItem.CANNOT_EXPORT_ITEM: Cannot export {name}. Is your browser support such a feature ?

composables.VERSION_MISMATCH: Application version mismatch, please install the latest available version or check your end point

session.DISCONNECT: The server connection has been lost, please wait until reconnection...
session.RECONNECT: The server connection has been restaured, you can refresh the application in case data has been updated during the disconnection.
session.REFUSED: Your connection have been refused by the server, you have been disconnected...

pwa.UPDATE_MESSAGE: To find out more consult the release note
To find out more consult the release note

schemas.ORGANISATIONS_NAME_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the name of this organisation
schemas.ORGANISATIONS_DESCRIPTION_FIELD_LABEL: Enter a description name of this organisation
schemas.MEMBERS_TAGS_FIELD_LABEL: Add somes tags to qualify this member
schemas.TAGS_NAME_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the name of this tag
schemas.TAGS_ICON_FIELD_LABEL: Set the icon of this tag
schemas.TAGS_DESCRIPTION_FIELD_LABEL: Enter a description of this tag
schemas.GROUPS_NAME_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the name of this group
schemas.GROUPS_DESCRIPTION_FIELD_LABEL: Enter a description for this group
schemas.PRECISION_FIELD_LABEL: Default number of decimal or significant digits

tours.APP_BAR_OVERFLOW_MENU_LABEL: When not visible, you can find it using the popup menu.
tours.APP_BAR_ACTIONS_LABEL: When not visible, you can find it in the actions bar.
tours.CARD_OVERFLOW_MENU_LABEL: Open the popup menu to see more actions.
tours.REMOVE_CONFIRMATION_LABEL: A confirmation will be required before final removal.

login.LOCAL_LABEL: You can login using your personal identifiers.
login.PASSWORD_VISIBILITY_LABEL: Display you password clearly if there is any doubt about.
login.LOST_PASSWORD_LINK_LABEL: If you have lost your password launch the recovery procedure
login.REGISTER_LINK_LABEL: If you don't yet have an account launch the registration procedure

reset-password.RESET_PROCEDURE_LABEL: If you have lost your password we will send you an email back containing a code to define a new one.
reset-password.EMAIL_LABEL: First, enter the email address you have used to register or to get invited.
reset-password.RESET_LABEL: Now finish by sending the email containing the link (please check the email is not in your spam folder).

register.LOCAL_LABEL: You can register to the system by defining your personal identifiers.
register.NAME_LABEL: Enter your name as viewed by others users first.
register.EMAIL_LABEL: Enter the email address you will use to connect and receive security related messages.
register.PASSWORD_LABEL: Choose a password, if it does not comply our security policy an alert will inform you about the rules to follow.
register.CONFIRM_PASSWORD_LABEL: Confirm your password to avoid any error.
register.TERMS_LABEL: Read and accept our terms of service in order to use the system.
register.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_LABEL: We will send you an email back containing a link to verify your address.
register.LOGIN_LINK_LABEL: You can now login whenever you want using your personal identifiers

create-organisation.ORGANISATION_NAME_LABEL: Enter the organisation name as viewed by others users.
create-organisation.ORGANISATION_AVATAR_LABEL: Select the image or the logo of your organisation as seen by your members.
create-organisation.CREATE_ORGANISATION_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new organisation.

account.PROFILE_LABEL: This activity allows to update your profile information
account.AVATAR_LABEL: Your avatar visible in the side menu when an image file has been selected.
account.NAME_LABEL: Your name as viewed by others users.
account.UPDATE_LABEL: Confirm the update in order to apply the modifications to your profile information.
account.VERIFY_EMAIL_LABEL: This section allows you to check your email.
account.TOKEN_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the code received by email.
account.RESEND_VERIFY_SIGNUP_LABEL: If you haven't received it or have lost it, you can have a new one sent to you.
account.PASSWORD_PROCEDURE_LABEL: This section allows you to initiate the password change procedure.
account.NEW_PASSWORD_LABEL: Choose a new password, if it does not comply our security policy an alert will inform you about the rules to follow.
account.CONFIRM_NEW_PASSWORD_LABEL: Confirm your password to avoid any error.
account.CHANGE_IDENTITY_PROCEDURE_LABEL: This section allows you to initiate the e-mail address change procedure.
account.CHANGE_EMAIL_LABEL: An email containing a code to confirm the modification will be sent to your new address (please check the email is not in your spam folder).
account.SUBSCRIPTIONS_LABEL: This section list all the subscriptions you have.
account.UNSUBSCRIBE_LABEL: Check for any suspect activity and remove outdated subscriptions.
account.DANGER_ZONE_LABEL: This activity allows to remove your account
account.DELETE_LABEL: A manual confirmation will be required before final removal.

groups.GROUPS_LABEL: This activity allows to manage the groups in your organisation.
groups.GROUP_DEFINITION_LABEL: A group allows to delegate the management of a shared workspace limited to its members.
groups.SEARCH_LABEL: Type part of a word contained in the name of your groups in the arising bar to perform a search.
groups.SORT_LABEL: Sort your groups by ascending or descending alphabetical order this button.
groups.NEW_GROUP_LABEL: Create a new group using this button.
groups.GROUP_CARD_LABEL: Each group is viewed as a card providing available actions.
groups.GROUP_MEMBERS_LABEL: This section shows you the members count of your group.
groups.LIST_GROUP_MEMBERS_LABEL: Shows the members of your group by selecting it.
groups.UPDATE_GROUP_LABEL: Update the name of your group through this action.
groups.UPDATE_GROUP_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Update the description of your group through this action.
groups.REMOVE_GROUP_LABEL: Remove your group through this action.

create-group.GROUP_NAME_LABEL: Choose a name for your group.
create-group.GROUP_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Choose a detailed description for your group.
create-group.CREATE_GROUP_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new group.

members.MEMBERS_LABEL: This activity allows to manage the members in your organisation.
members.MEMBER_DEFINITION_LABEL: A member is a user able to access the shared workspace offered by your organisation.
members.SEARCH_LABEL: Type part of a word contained in the name of your members in the arising bar to perform a search.
members.SEARCH_MORE_LABEL: Type also a word contained in the name of a group or a tag associated to your members to filter accordingly.
members.FILTER_LABEL: Filter your members according to their status using this button.
members.SORT_LABEL: Sort your members by ascending or descending alphabetical order this button.
members.ADD_INVITE_MEMBER_LABEL: Add members to your organisation through this action.
members.ADD_MEMBER_LABEL: If your future member already has an account, add him using this button.
members.INVITE_MEMBER_LABEL: If your future member does not yet have an account, invite him using this button and we will create it .
members.MEMBER_CARD_LABEL: Each member is viewed as a card providing available actions.
members.ROLE_LABEL: Visualise the role of your member at a glance.
members.TAGS_LABEL: Visualise tags of your member at a glance as well.
members.TAGS_CONTENT_LABEL: Use the cross to delete a tag.
members.GROUPS_LABEL: Visualise groups of your member at a glance as well.
members.GROUPS_CONTENT_LABEL: Select one of the member groups to show available actions.
members.ADD_TAG_LABEL: Add tag of your member through this action.
members.JOIN_GROUP_LABEL: Add your member to a group through this action.
members.CHANGE_ROLE_LABEL: Update the role of your member through this action.
members.REMOVE_MEMBER_LABEL: Remove the member from your organisation through this action.

add-member.UNIQUE_TAB_LABEL: Add a unique person to your organisation using his email adress.
add-member.UNIQUE_EMAIL_LABEL: Enter the email of the desired person
add-member.UNIQUE_CONTINUE_BUTTON_LABEL: Click this button to procced with the invitation or to add the person if they already have an account.
add-member.UNIQUE_NAME_LABEL: Enter the name of the person.
add-member.UNIQUE_ROLE_LABEL: Select its role within your organisation. A member has a read-only access to your organisation while a manager can edit it, and a owner has full control.
add-member.UNIQUE_ADD_BUTTON_LABEL: Click this button to send the invitation.
add-member.MULTIPLE_TAB_LABEL: Add multiple persons to your organisation using a CSV file.
add-member.MULTIPLE_FILE_LABEL: Upload the CSV file listing the persons to be invited. Each person is represented by a row containing the fields name, email and role separated using a , separator.
add-member.MULTIPLE_ADD_BUTTON_LABEL: Click this button to proceed with the invitations.

role-member.ROLE_LABEL: Select its role within your organisation. A member has a read-only access to your organisation while a manager can edit it, and a owner has full control.
role-member.UPDATE_ROLE_LABEL: Update the role of your member

join-group.GROUP_NAME_LABEL: Typing the first characters of a group name to make it selectable.
join-group.MEMBER_ROLE_LABEL: Choisissez le rôle de la personne au sein du groupe.
join-group.ROLES_LABEL: Un membre a un accès consultatif au groupe alors qu'un gestionnaire a le pouvoir de gérer les membres du groupe (ajout/suppression).
join-group.ADD_MEMBER_LABEL: Confirm adding the member to the group.

add-tag.TAG_NAME_LABEL: Typing the first characters of a tag name to make it selectable if it already exists using the Return key.
add-tag.ADD_TAG_LABEL: Confirm addition the tags on your members.

tags.TAGS_LABEL: This activity allows to manage the tags in your organisation.
tags.TAG_DEFINITION_LABEL: A tag allows to classify a subset of your organisation members (e.g. a skill or a service).
tags.SEARCH_LABEL: Type part of a word contained in the name of your tags in the arising bar to perform a search.
tags.SORT_LABEL: Sort your tags by ascending or descending alphabetical order this button.
tags.TAG_CARD_LABEL: Each tag is viewed as a card providing available actions.
tags.NEW_TAG_LABEL: Create a new tag using this button.
tags.TAG_COUNT_LABEL: This section shows you the number of members having your tag.
tags.LIST_MEMBERS_LABEL: Shows the members with this tag by selecting it.
tags.REMOVE_TAG_LABEL: Remove your tag through this action.
tags.UPDATE_TAG_LABEL: Update properties of your tag through this action, this will update all members having this tag.
tags.UPDATE_TAG_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Update the description of your tag through this action.

create-tag.TAG_NAME_LABEL: Choose a name for your tag.
create-tag.TAG_ICON_LABEL: Choose an icon to easily recognize your tag.
create-tag.TAG_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Choose a detailed description for your tag.
create-tag.CREATE_TAG_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new tag.

exporter.MESSAGE: Select the file format to export
exporter.EXPORTS_LIMIT_REACHED: You have reached the maximum number of exports allowed

KWelcome.WELCOME_MESSAGE: This quick start guide covers the main application features.
KWelcome.ONLINE_HELP: Read first our online help to get an overview of the basic concepts
KWelcome.CONTEXTUAL_HELP: To get contextual help whenever your are lost simply click on the following icon
KWelcome.TOUR_MESSAGE: Launch now a quick overview tutorial detailing the main menu by clicking on the following icon
KWelcome.TOUR_LINK_MESSAGE: Each time a tutorial step exhibits this icon it allows to launch a new one detailing the target feature.
KWelcome.GOODBYE_MESSAGE: Thanks for reading this tutorial, you are now ready to use the application !

KDeleteAccountManager.TITLE: Delete my account
KDeleteAccountManager.QUESTION: Are you sure you want to delete your account ?
KDeleteAccountManager.CONFIRMATION_TITLE: Warning: the deletion of your account is irrevocable and all data attached to it will be lost
KDeleteAccountManager.CONFIRMATION: Enter your account name to confirm the deletion

KPasswordManager.TITLE: Change my password
KPasswordManager.PASSWORD_CHANGED: Your password has been successfully changed

KEmailManager.TITLE: Change my email address
KEmailManager.TOKEN_LABEL: To validate your new email address, enter the code you received by email
KEmailManager.EMAIL_CHANGED: You new address has been taken into account. An email has been sent to you to confirm the change.

KVerifyEmailManager.TITLE: Check my email address
KVerifyEmailManager.HELP_LABEL: Why should I verify my email address ?
KVerifyEmailManager.HELP_TEXT: Verifying your email address improves the security of your account. Once you have verified your email address, both your password and access to your email account are required in order to make any changes to your account credentials, such as your password and contact email address. This helps further protect your account from being stolen by a potential phisher.
KVerifyEmailManager.HELP_EMAIL_LABEL: I never received the verification email, what should I do ?
KVerifyEmailManager.HELP_EMAIL_TEXT: If you do not receive your signup verification email and you are running a Spam filter, check and make sure the message has not been filtered as spam. Please try adding {email} to your contacts or trusted senders list within your email client and attempt to re-verify your email address. You can also click the button below and we'll send you the email again.
KVerifyEmailManager.TOKEN_LABEL: Enter the code received by email to validate your email address
KVerifyEmailManager.EMAIL_VERIFIED: Your address has been verified. An email has been sent to you to confirm the change.
KVerifyEmailManager.ERROR_MESSAGE: Invalid code, request a new one
